title: Scheduler command variables of grafana are not correct on cloud
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
v6.5.x

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->
In cloud env, open tikv details board

### What did you expect?
Scheduler's command should be prewrite/commit/...
### What did happened?
![8OGAybIT8z](https://github.com/tikv/tikv/assets/13497871/8ff61c58-694e-4fcc-ad39-7c25ed742649)
